weapons.name: Titanic Might
weapons.description: Melee Weapon. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain +3 Strength and Magical Attacks.

weapons.name: Blessed Inscriptions
weapons.description: Melee Weapon. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain Divine Attacks and failed to-wound rolls must be rerolled.

weapons.name: King Slayer
weapons.description: Melee Weapon. The wielder of the enchanted weapon gains +X Strength, +X Armour Penetration, +X Attack Value and Magical Attacks when attacking with it, where X is equal to the number of enemy Characters in base contact with the wielder's unit. This bonus is calculated and effective at the Initiative Step when such attacks are made.

weapons.name: Shield Breaker
weapons.description: Melee Weapon. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain +6 Armour Penetration, Magical Attacks ,and can never wound on to-wound rolls better than 3+.

weapons.name: Hero's Heart
weapons.description: Hand Weapon and Paired Weapon. The wielder of this enchanted weapon gains +1 Attack Value when using it. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain Magical Attacks and always have at least Strength 5 and at least Armour Penetration 3.

weapons.name: Touch of Greatness
weapons.description: Melee Weapon. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration and Magical Attacks. Strength modifiers from this weapon (combining both mundane and Weapon Enchantment modifiers) cannot exceed +2 (but can exceed +2 through modifiers from other sources, such as spells).

weapons.name: Supernatural Dexterity
weapons.description: Melee Weapon. The wielder of this enchanted weapon gains +2 Offensive Skill and +2 Agility while using it, and attacks made with it gain Magical Attacks.

weapons.name: Cleansing Light
weapons.description: Melee Weapon. At the start of each Round of Combat, the wielder may choose to give attacks made with this enchanted weapon Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

weapons.name: Burning Portent
weapons.description: Hand Weapon. Attacks made with this Weapon have their Armour Penetration set to 10 and gain Magical Attacks, Flaming Attacks and Multiple Wounds (D3).

weapons.name: Symbol of Slaughter
weapons.description: Hand Weapon and Paired Weapons. When using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value and +2 Agility and suffers -2 Offensive Skill and -2 Defensive Skill. Attacks made with this Weapon have gain Magical Attacks.

specialrules.specialrule: Breath Attack  (Str 4 , AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Dying Embers)
